**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>

 /kind bug

> /kind feature


**What happened**:

```
[root@ ibm1046 hp]# cat pv.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: local-pv-1
  labels:
    type: local
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 20Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  hostPath:
    path: /tmp/data/pv-1
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Recycle
```
```
[root@ ibm1046 hp]# cat pvc.yaml
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: example-local-clai
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
```

Use the above two files create one PV and PVC, then delete the PVC, the PV will become failed but not released.

```
root@ibm1046:~/gyliu/hp# kubectl -s 127.0.0.1:8888 get pv | grep local-pv-1
local-pv-1                               20Gi       RWO           Recycle         Failed    default/example-local-clai
```

```
root@ibm1046:~/gyliu/hp# kubectl -s  127.0.0.1:8888 describe pv local-pv-1
Name:		local-pv-1
Labels:		type=local
Annotations:	kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration={"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"PersistentVolume","metadata":{"annotations":{},"labels":{"type":"local"},"name":"local-pv-1","namespace":""},"spec":{"access...
		pv.kubernetes.io/bound-by-controller=yes
StorageClass:
Status:		Failed
Claim:		default/example-local-clai
Reclaim Policy:	Recycle
Access Modes:	RWO
Capacity:	20Gi
Message:	Recycle failed: pod failed, pod.Status.Message unknown.
Source:
    Type:	HostPath (bare host directory volume)
    Path:	/tmp/data/pv-1
Events:
  FirstSeen	LastSeen	Count	From				SubObjectPath	Type		Reason			Message
  ---------	--------	-----	----				-------------	--------	------			-------
  1m		1m		1	persistentvolume-controller			Warning		VolumeFailedRecycle	Recycle failed: pod failed, pod.Status.Message unknown.
  1m		15s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: Successfully assigned recycler-for-local-pv-1 to 9.42.76.16
  1m		14s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: MountVolume.SetUp succeeded for volume "default-token-x8llz"
  1m		14s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: MountVolume.SetUp succeeded for volume "vol"
  1m		13s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: pulling image "gcr.io/google_containers/busybox"
  1m		13s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: Successfully pulled image "gcr.io/google_containers/busybox"
  1m		13s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: Created container
  1m		12s		45	persistentvolume-controller			Normal		RecyclerPod		Recycler pod: Started container
```

The busybox recycler never succeed for power.

/sig storage
